message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its unique qualities and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase this product at a special price of $1,350,000. This represents a substantial discount compared to its intrinsic worth of $1,200,000 to you, providing you with an excellent return on investment. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing further details with you.
